topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack 1.1: Viewing Your Network

body.p: The Network Topology screen is a physical representation of your network configuration.

ol.li: Launch the HP Helion OpenStack Horizon Dashboard.
Select the appropriate region and project.
Click the Admin dashboard, then the Network panel.

Click the Network Topology tab.
Your network looks similar to the following diagram.

body.p: A router (here, labeled Router 1) is attached to the external network (labeled Ext-Net) so the internal network (labeled Network1) can be reached from the Internet. A Network1 is attached to the router.
